pages.text: Forged in the $(blood)Hellfire Forge$() using construction-themed materials: $(item)Sugar$(), $(item)Crafting Table$(), $(item)Dispenser$(), and $(item)Bricks$(). Requires $(will)128 demon will minimum$() and consumes $(will)64 will$().

A reagent infused with the essence of construction and rapid building. This catalyst can be combined with a $(item)Reinforced Slate$() in an Alchemy Array to create the $(l:animus:sigils/sigil_builder)Sigil of the Fast Builder$().

pages.title: Crafting Chain
pages.text: $(bold)Step 1:$() Forge this reagent in the Hellfire Forge$(br2)$(bold)Step 2:$() Create an Alchemy Array using Arcane Ash$(br2)$(bold)Step 3:$() Right-click the reagent onto the array$(br2)$(bold)Step 4:$() Right-click a Reinforced Slate onto the array to complete the transformation
